fields.name: AXE_DIG
fields.description: Exposed by axes to allow querying tool behaviours

fields.name: PICKAXE_DIG
fields.description: Exposed by pickaxes to allow querying tool behaviours

fields.name: SHOVEL_DIG
fields.description: Exposed by shovels to allow querying tool behaviours

fields.name: HOE_DIG
fields.description: Exposed by hoes to allow querying tool behaviours

fields.name: SWORD_DIG
fields.description: Exposed by swords to allow querying tool behaviours

fields.name: SHEARS_DIG
fields.description: Exposed by shears to allow querying tool behaviours

fields.name: AXE_STRIP
fields.description: Passed onto IForgeBlock.getToolModifiedState(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState, net.minecraft.world.item.context.UseOnContext, net.minecraftforge.common.ToolAction, boolean) when an axe wants to strip a log

fields.name: AXE_SCRAPE
fields.description: Passed onto IForgeBlock.getToolModifiedState(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState, net.minecraft.world.item.context.UseOnContext, net.minecraftforge.common.ToolAction, boolean) when an axe wants to scrape oxidization off copper

fields.name: AXE_WAX_OFF
fields.description: Passed onto IForgeBlock.getToolModifiedState(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState, net.minecraft.world.item.context.UseOnContext, net.minecraftforge.common.ToolAction, boolean) when an axe wants to remove wax out of copper

fields.name: SHOVEL_FLATTEN
fields.description: Passed onto IForgeBlock.getToolModifiedState(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState, net.minecraft.world.item.context.UseOnContext, net.minecraftforge.common.ToolAction, boolean) when a shovel wants to turn dirt into path

fields.name: SWORD_SWEEP
fields.description: Used during player attack to figure out if a sweep attack should be performed

fields.name: SHEARS_HARVEST
fields.description: This action is exposed by shears and corresponds to a harvest action that is triggered with a right click on a block that supports such behaviour. Example: Right click with shears on a beehive with honey level 5 to harvest it

fields.name: SHEARS_CARVE
fields.description: This action is exposed by shears and corresponds to a carve action that is triggered with a right click on a block that supports such behaviour. Example: Right click with shears o a pumpkin to carve it

fields.name: SHEARS_DISARM
fields.description: This action is exposed by shears and corresponds to a disarm action that is triggered by breaking a block that supports such behaviour. Example: Breaking a trip wire with shears to disarm it.

fields.name: HOE_TILL
fields.description: Passed onto IForgeBlock.getToolModifiedState(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState, net.minecraft.world.item.context.UseOnContext, net.minecraftforge.common.ToolAction, boolean) when a hoe wants to turn dirt into soil

fields.name: SHIELD_BLOCK
fields.description: A tool action corresponding to the 'block' action of shields.
